subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic, the defending champion, defeated Tommy Haas, 6-2, 7-6 (1), in their third-round match at the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif. A 21-year-old Serb who also made the final two years ago, Djokovic served well and hit crisp, accurate groundstrokes to beat the 30-year-old Haas.
